text: Yehu to keli mɛnni, a yi naralan Yehonadabu ra, Rekabu a diina, naxan fa a ralandeni. A yi a xɔntɔn, a a fala a xa, a naxa, “I bɔɲɛn sariɲan n ma fe yi ba, alo n gbeen sariɲan i ya fe yi kii naxan yi?” Yehonadabu yi a yabi, a naxa, “A na kii nin.” Yehu yi a fala a xa, a naxa, “Xa a na kii nin, i yiin so n yii.” Yehu yi a rate a fɛma a wontoron kui,
